ice-cream-tree.png.description: tree diagram with three choices for scoop 1, each followed by three more for scoop 2, and each of those followed by two more choices for toppings

6-1-course-permute-w-replacement.png.description: a tree diagram showing the 6 meal options

6-2-course-permute-w-replacement.png.description: A tree diagram with the top level showing the 6 options and the next level linking each of the initial 6 options to the same 6 options such that in the end there are 36 possible choices

4-1-course-permute-wo-replacement.png.description: a tree diagram showing the four initial options

4-2-course-permute-wo-replacement.png.description: a tree diagram: the top level shows 4 options. The level links each of the initial 4 options to the 3 remaining options, for a total of 12 possibilities

4-4-course-permute-wo-replacement.png.description: A tree diagram: The top level has 4 choices. The next level links each of those to the remaining 3. The next level links each of those to the remaining 2. The final level links each of those to the remaining option, for a total of 24 possible 4 course meals.
